isicv4.dldescription: International Standard Industrial Classification: 0141 = cattle farming, 0144 = sheep farming, 0150 = mixed farming, 1010 = meat processing, 4610 = livestock auction/trader. Refer http://schema.org/isicV4

geo.dldescription: The geographical coordinates of the place

globalLocationNumber.dldescription: The Global Location Number (GLN, sometimes also referred to as International Location Number or ILN) of the respective organization, person, or place. The GLN is a 13-digit number used to identify parties and physical locations. Equates to NZBN. Refer http://schema.org/globalLocationNumber

contactPoint.dldescription: A contact point for a person or organization. Supersedes contactPoints object.
